ai-ya7.2.6:1.1_0: in that sensual desire, the underlying tendency to repulsion, the underlying tendency to repulsion underlies that.
ai-ya7.2.6:2.1_0: and the underlying tendency to sensual desire arises when it comes to sensual desire.
ai-ya7.2.6:3.1_0: in that sensual desire arises when it comes to be reborn.
ai-ya7.2.6:4.1_0: whether the underlying tendency to conceit arises: the underlying tendency to conceit arises?
ai-ya7.2.6:5.1_0: The underlying tendency to conceit doesn’t give rise to sensual desire.
ai-ya7.2.6:5.1_1: (The underlying tendency to conceit should be expanded.)
ai-ya7.2.6:6.1_0: and the underlying tendency to sensual desire does not lie within that.
ai-ya7.2.6:7.1_0: and the underlying tendency to sensual desire does not lie within that.
ai-ya7.2.6:8.1_0: and the underlying tendency to sensual desire does not arise without conceit.
ai-ya7.2.6:9.1_0: The underlying tendency to sensual desire does not arise without underlying tendency to conceit.
ai-ya7.2.6:9.1_1: The underlying tendency to sensual desire does not arise, or,
ai-ya7.2.6:10.1_0: whether or not the underlying tendency to conceit does not lie within that.
